Posts.Content: May 8, 2009 06:52PM xraymammo wrote: Hey G....its great you went for a mammo to start....go for sono...biopsy and MRI what the heck...cover your bases...you are your best judge and if you are not comfortable with just one and it will give you piece of mind go for it all....take it from a mammo tech/breast cancer suvirvor...depending on the surgeon they might do both breasts but usually not for a sono take care and good luck X
